com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook

Class ODocumentHookAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook.ODocumentHookAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ORecordHook

    public abstract class ODocumentHookAbstract
extends Object
implements ORecordHook
    Hook abstract class that calls separate methods for ODocument records.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--(at)--orientdb.com)
    See Also:
    ORecordHook
